author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Home Science College and Research Institute here will conduct a training programme in commercial production of moringa products, including powder, pickle, cookies and noodles, on March 2 between 9.30 a.m. and 5 p.m.

Participants can register their names on or before March 1 with the Head, Department of Home Science Extension, Home Science College and Research Institute, Madurai 625 104 (Phone 0452 2424684), according to a press release from G. Pushpa, Dean (in-charge).
title: Training programme on moringa products
